title: Stuck on "Logging on..."
body: Ever since yesterday (10/26), I am unable to log in. The client would keep trying to log in for ~30 seconds and than a connection error pops up saying I was unable to connect to the PVP.net server even though the servers are still up according to the server status page.

replies.body:
A lot of login issues are caused by either settings in Internet Explorer (which the client uses) or issues reaching our servers along your network routing. I suggest working through our [Login Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) as your first step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if you continue to have issues after trying those steps out.
I followed the instructions on the Login Issues Guide but the issues still persist.

Are you perchance on a campus connection? I've gotten a number of reports of login issues with a few different Universities that began this week and has been affecting only the *Wireless* network. If so, I recommend reaching out to your network administrator about this issue so they can investigate.
I also still have the same issue. I followed everything but cannot log in.
Seems like we're not the only ones. Hopefully Riot figures it out soon.
